LEFT JOIN tbl_template_like tl ON t.TEMPLATE_NO = tl.TEMPLATE_NO AND tl.LIKE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY t.TEMPLATE_NO, t.TEMPLATE_TITLE, to_char(t.TEMPLATE_CONTENT), t.REGIST_DT
ORDER BY templateLikes ${inOrder} , registDate DESC
ORDER BY registDate ${inOrder}
ORDER BY t.REGIST_DT DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
